      #include<stdio.h>
      #include<iostream>
        #include<stdlib.h>
        #include<math.h>
        #include<string.h>

        using namespace std;


        int main()
        {
            int t;
            cin>>t;

            while(t--)
            {
                long long int l,r,i,j,sum=0,num,count;
                cin>>l>>r;
                for(num = l;num<=r;num++)
                {
                    count = 0;
                    for(j=2;j<=sqrt(num);j++)
                    {
                        if(num%j==0)
                        {
                            count++;
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                    if(count==0 && num!= 1)
             sum=sum+num;

                }
            cout<<sum<<"\n";
            }
            return 0;
        }
